data.eml:eml: A new red-eyed of stream treefrog of Hyloscirtus (Anura: Hylidae) from Peru, with comments on the taxonomy of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rivera-Correa, Mauricio, García-Burneo, Karla, Grant, Taran (2016): A new red-eyed of stream treefrog of Hyloscirtus (Anura: Hylidae) from Peru, with comments on the taxonomy of the genus. Zootaxa 4061 (1): 29-41, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.1.3
